page.title: 06Employment
page.content: This square is divided by a dis manteled railway line and the land use is noticeably different on either side One side is mainly residential and the other more rural.The residential area includes both private and council owned property The houses that centre around the shopping precinct and Catholic church are mainly council owned.The shops include a number of foodstores, a hair dresser,post office,bridal shop and a fish and chip shop.Seventy seven people are employed on either a full time or part time basis.Most shops are open between 8.30 a.m and 5.30.p.m.although some have their own special times to fit in with the consumers needs.For instance the Fish and Chip shop opens at lunch time and in the evenings. The Newsagents is open at 6.30.a.m when the newspapers arrive and open everyday of the week.
